thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.ca
thread.title: Sandi Nishikawa

author: Sandi Nishikawa
title: Sandi Nishikawa
text: I ordered 20 photocards and received them 2 days later. They were as I laid out. The only thing I would have changed is the lay out of the text inside the card, it was a little too close to the fold but that was my fault not the company's fault. I was happy with the overall quality and would happily recommend them to anyone. I will definitely use your services again. As another reviewer indicated it is nice that you are local and are reasonably priced.
